positive_examples: This is an example of operational security reasoning process.
The operational security reasoning process demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed operational security reasoning process in this context.
A typical case of operational security reasoning process would involve these features.
The concept of operational security reasoning process applies here.
The cognitive process of protecting sensitive information and activities from adversary detection through systematic security planning.
negative_examples: This is an example of evasion planning process, not operational security reasoning process.
This represents tradecraft reasoning process in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvasionPlanningProcess, or other types of TradecraftReasoningProcess

definition: A reasoning process focused on protecting sensitive operations and information from adversaries.
